summary: This bill, H.R. 4020, authorizes the Secretary of Defense to establish programs allowing students in Department of Defense Education Activity (DODEA) schools to enroll in dual or concurrent enrollment programs with institutions of higher education. These programs would allow students to earn college credit while still in high school, and the bill allows for financial assistance to cover program costs. The bill defines DODEA schools and dual/concurrent enrollment, referencing the Higher Education Act of 1965.
